definition: spacious and well-lit/open and clear/(of character) optimistic/cheerful/carefree

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
suddenly opens up to a wide panorama (idiom); to come to a wide clearing/fig. everything becomes clear at once/to achieve speedy enlightenment
Michelangelo Buonarroti (1475-1564), Renaissance painter and sculptor

sentences.english: Have a bright shape, lively & open, auto fans, a member of amateur racing car organization.
sentences.chinese: 形象阳光，活泼开朗，喜爱汽车，参加业余赛车队。

sentences.english: Looking up at the open sky, he suddenly cheered up.
sentences.chinese: 仰望碧天，他的心情豁然开朗。

sentences.english: I graduated from junior high school star, I lively and cheerful character, witty humor.
sentences.chinese: 偶毕业于红星初中，偶哒性格活泼开朗，风趣幽母霈。

sentences.english: Learned before, a table personnel, optimistic, cheerful, witty humor.
sentences.chinese: 博学多才，一表人才，开朗乐观，风趣幽默。

sentences.english: I am a decent and open-minded girl, so I am enthusiastic about studying and work and the life itself.
sentences.chinese: 在平时生活中，我是个开朗热情大方的孩子。

sentences.english: He was buoyed up by thinking that he would recover.
sentences.chinese: 他想到还会恢复健康，心情也就开朗起来。

sentences.english: The driver is talkative and a good guide and had been working in Guangdong before.
sentences.chinese: 司机开朗，曾在广东打过工，一路是个好向导。

sentences.english: Highly-motivated and reliable person and pleasant personality.
sentences.chinese: 上进心强，为人可靠，性格开朗。

sentences.english: I like the character in the arts cheerful girl.
sentences.chinese: 从事艺术的我喜欢性格开朗的女孩。

sentences.english: When you're happy you can work towards that title.
sentences.chinese: 当你心情开朗的时候，就自然会为了夺冠而努力前进。

sentences.english: Pick up a couple of joke books. This makes you a little more outgoing and friendly.
sentences.chinese: 选择几本笑话书，这会使你更加开朗和友好。

sentences.english: I am lively and cheerful, easy-going and generous, others frankly.
sentences.chinese: 我性格活泼开朗，随和大方，待人坦诚。

sentences.english: The Adagio section ends in a relatively subdued and bright mood.
sentences.chinese: 慢板于此处带著节制的开朗情绪中暂时告一段落。

sentences.english: A cheerful mood unties all knots, and you will see blossoms in small dots.
sentences.chinese: 心情开朗世情好，点点颜色都是花。

sentences.english: She's a bright lassie and a lovely one, too.
sentences.chinese: 她是一个开朗又可爱的小妞。

sentences.english: I am happy and bright life and people-friendly.
sentences.chinese: 生活中的我活泼开朗与人友善。

definition: (of a person's manner or character) gentle and quiet
